snippet.title: Best car stereos
snippet.description: Here you'll find our current five overall-favorite car stereos, but check in regularly for updates a

snippet.title: FIFA Soccer 13 (iOS)
snippet.description: If you want a great soccer game for iOS, FIFA 13 hits the mark on almost every level. With tons of teams, new skill moves, and online multiplayer, this is the sports game to beat on iOS.

snippet.title: FIFA Soccer 13 (Wii U)
snippet.description: FIFA Soccer 13 on the Wii U might lack some of the series' latest tweaks, but it still plays an enjoyable and thoroughly rewarding game of football.

snippet.title: FIFA Soccer 13 (PS Vita)
snippet.description: Are there enough noticeable differences in FIFA 13 to warrant a purchase?

snippet.title: 11 ways to trick Android into using less data
snippet.description: With expensive tiered data plans, it's easy to hit your limit. Follow this guide to cut back on data usage (and avoid overage charges).

snippet.title: Samsung and Red Sox' Ortiz trick Obama into selfie ad
snippet.description: It seemed innocent enough. A famous slugger taking a selfie with the president. Now Samsung admits it was the same kind of marketing as Ellen's Oscars selfie.

snippet.title: Apple TV adds Major League Soccer, Disney Junior channels
snippet.description: An over-the-air update adds another subscription sports channel to the set-top box's roster and supplements other Disney apps recruited earlier this year.

snippet.title: Disappearing wine trick replaces wine with air
snippet.description: VinEdge uses an inflatable insert to help preserve contents of opened bottles of wine. As wine is poured, the insert inflates automatically.

snippet.title: Tech Minute: Safe trick-or-treating courtesy of these apps
snippet.description: While kids are focused on costumes and candy this Halloween, parents need to keep an eye on safety. In this Tech Minute, CNET's Kara Tsuboi recommends smartphone apps to ensure everyone has a spooky, but safe, night.

snippet.title: Presto! iBalance magic trick makes smartphones float in midair
snippet.description: Spectators won't believe their eyes when you make your phone -- or theirs -- defy the laws of physics.
